ELABORATE AND COSTLY
STYLE, COMBINING W I T H NOVELTY,

ELEGANCE & COMFORT.

Tho Proscenium has been entirely reconstructed.
The Fronts of the Boxes covered with various colored Silks, and the Ornaments interspersed with
authentic Portraits of celebrated Dramatic Authors, executed in Oil, by Mr. J . M. W R I G H T ,

A new principle of Ventilation
has been adopted, which will at all times preserve an even temperature.

ELABORATE AM) COSTLY

ELEGANCE & COMFORT.
T h e Proscenium has been entirely reconstructed.
'ITie Froats of the Boxes covered with various colored Silks, and the Ornaments interspersed with
authentic Portraits of celebrated Dramatic A nthors, executed in Oil, by Mr. J . M. W R I G H T .

A n e w p r i n c i p l e of V e n t i l a t i o n
has been adopted, which will at a l l times preserve an even temperature.

THE ENRICHMENTS
